name: 3dbucket
author: AFNI Developers
description: Concatenate sub-bricks from input datasets into one big bucket dataset.

inputs.description: Use 'pname' for the output dataset prefix name.
inputs.name: Prefix

inputs.description: Use 'pname' for the output dataset prefix name.
inputs.name: Output

inputs.description: Use 'dir' for the output dataset session directory. [default='./'=current working directory]
inputs.name: Session

inputs.description: Append bricks to the end of the 'fname' dataset.
inputs.name: Glue to

inputs.description: If fname dataset does not exist, create it (like -prefix). Otherwise append to fname (like -glueto).
inputs.name: A-Glue to

inputs.description: Execute a 'dry run'; only print out what would be done.
inputs.name: Dry run

inputs.description: Print out some verbose output as the program proceeds.
inputs.name: Verbose

inputs.description: Create an anatomical bucket. If neither of these options is given, the output type is determined from the first input type.
inputs.name: Anatomical Bucket

inputs.description: Input datasets with optional sub-brick selection.
inputs.name: Input Files
